alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 15 at 10:22PM CDT until March 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1022 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Thomasville to 3 miles north of Chatom, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Chatom, Millry and Coffeeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
